name: Sky (Kisa)
description: I made my own character controller, triggers and of course - design. Push the buttons on main menu and explore my work. In some places you need open door, or activate button. I like Portal series game and here i make engine absolutely idently my favorite project. So if you see buttons connected with doors - find cube and put it onto button. Use "E"-key for take or drop objects... Also i have example with piano, were you just need push piano keys using mouse.
